meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Japanese birch</kanji> <kanji>river</kanji> is <vocabulary>Azusa River</vocabulary> or simply <vocabulary>Azusagawa</vocabulary>. Azusagawa is both the Japanese name for the Azusa River, and a Japanese family name.
readingMnemonic: You learned both of these readings with the kanji. You just need to remember that rendaku turns かわ into がわ.
